metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11428 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
OneLogin Ruby-SAML 1.6.0 and earlier may incorrectly utilize the results ofXML DOM traversal and canonicalization APIs in such a way that an attackermay be able to manipulate the SAML data without invalidating thecryptographic signature, allowing the attack to potentially bypassauthentication to SAML service providers.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11428` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-saml - 1.7.2-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: ruby-saml package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.7.2-1').
